head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths SCHOR, AIDA L.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths SCHOR, AIDA L.

block.p: SCHOR-Aida L. 85, of Hollywood, FL, on May 27, 2000. Beloved wife of the late Irving Schor, cherished mother of Judith Bodner (Edward) and Edward Schor (Abby), devoted grandmother of Kate Schor, Emily Schor, Erica Bodner and Jill Steinberg, great-grandmother of Benjamin Bodner, Emily Steinberg and Blair Steinberg, caring sister of Arthur Neiman and the late Irving Neiman. Services Monday, May 29, 10:30 AM, Riverside Chapels, Amsterdam Ave. and 76th St., NYC.
